tos_checkbox_value.string: I declare that I have read and accept the <accent>terms of use.</accent>

pp_checkbox_value.string: I declare that I have read and accept the <accent>privacy policy.</accent>

welcome_text.string: Use Bitkit to pay anyone, anywhere, any time, and spend your bitcoin on the things you value in life.

slide0_text.string: Bitkit hands you the keys to manage your money. Spend now or save for later. The choice is yours.

slide1_text.string: Spend bitcoin faster than ever. Enjoy instant and cheap payments with friends, family, and merchants.

slide1_note.string: *Bitkit does not currently provide Lightning services in your country, but you can still connect to other nodes.

slide2_text.string: Take charge of your digital life with portable profiles and payable contacts.

slide3_text.string: Swipe to hide your balance, enjoy more private payments, and protect your wallet by enabling security features.

slide4_text.string: Let’s create your wallet. Please be aware that Bitkit is mobile software. <accent>Don’t store all your money in Bitkit.</accent>

passphrase_text.string: You can add a secret passphrase to the 12-word recovery phrase. If you do, make sure you don’t forget.

restore_phrase.string: Please type in your recovery phrase from any (paper) backup.

restore_red_explain.string: If a word is shown in <accent>red</accent>, it means that it was not found in the recovery phrase dictionary. Check for spelling errors.

restore_inv_checksum.string: The checksum for the recovery phrase appears to be incorrect. Please double check your recovery phrase.

restore_passphrase_meaning.string: *Optional, enter only if you’ve set up one.

restore_error_description.string: Bitkit could not restore your wallet from backup or recovery phrase.

restore_success_text.string: You have successfully restored your wallet from backup. Enjoy Bitkit!

restore_failed_text.string: Bitkit restored your savings, but failed to restore your current spending balance (Lightning state) and wallet data.

restore_no_backup_warn.string: If you previously had a lightning backup it will be overwritten and lost. This could result in a loss of funds.

empty_wallet.string:
To get
started
<accent>send
Bitcoin</accent>
to your
wallet

multiple_text.string: Don't install your Bitkit recovery phrase into multiple phones simultaneously, as this can corrupt your data.
